name: Softnauts the Game
storyline: The Sun might explode any moment and human civilization will cease to exist. Governments are sending rockets from Earth in different directions to explore the Universe to find and collect all the memory chips. The chips are the remains of space sniffers sent on a journey long time ago. They contain information that will help Humans to find their way to New Earth. Kadett, use your agility, speed and endurance to save our species. Your rocket takes off in 50 seconds. Hurry up and let the force be with you!
summary:
Great game for people who like to beat scores over and over again.
Very good music and nice animations are making time spend on this game very delightful.
It's for free on Apple Store.
